alert.note: Alert for Central Middlesex County; Eastern Norfolk; Northern Bristol; Northern Worcester; Southeast Middlesex; Southern Worcester; Suffolk; Western Norfolk; Western Plymouth (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 31 at 9:56PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Norfolk, southwestern Suffolk, east central Worcester, southeastern Middlesex, west central Plymouth and north central Bristol Counties through 1100 PM EDT... At 955 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Hudson, or over Marlborough, moving southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. At 939 PM, trained spotters and amateur radio operators reported pea- sized hail in Leominster from this strong thunderstorm. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Boston, Brockton, Quincy, Newton, Framingham, Weymouth, Marlborough, Braintree, Shrewsbury, Natick, Randolph, Needham, Norwood, Wellesley, Milton, Stoughton, Bridgewater, Dedham, Walpole and Mansfield. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed. This storm may intensify and become severe. Stay tuned to your local media for updates and possible warnings.

area.areaDesc: Central Middlesex County; Eastern Norfolk; Northern Bristol; Northern Worcester; Southeast Middlesex; Southern Worcester; Suffolk; Western Norfolk; Western Plymouth
